narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Guardian Home Care INC is a Home Health provider based in Philadelphia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.7M in Medicaid payments across 67K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
